text: meathead Stay down ! It 's your choice man , walk away now and you wo n't get your ass kicked .
meathead You should 've stayed down , Jack .
charlie_pace Jack , Jack !
charlie_pace Jack . Hey , Jack . There 's someone out there . You gotta — the current's — there 's someone out there , look .
charlie_pace I woke up and she's — I do n't swim .
charlie_pace I do n't swim .
dr_jack_shephard You okay , just take deep breaths now . Come on , just breathe , just breathe .
boone_carlyle Did you get her ?
dr_jack_shephard What ?
boone_carlyle There was a woman — I was trying to — did you get her ?
boone_carlyle You got ta go back .
kate_austen Jack ?
dr_jack_shephard There 's someone else still out there .
kate_austen Hey .
dr_jack_shephard So , what 'd they say ?
kate_austen Jack , maybe you should ... .
dr_jack_shephard Who was she ?

kate_austen Her name was Joanna , she was n't supposed to be on the plane . She was scuba diving off the barrier reef and got an ear infection so the doctor grounded her for two days . She bumped her flight . That 's how she ended up with us .
dr_jack_shephard She was just swimming this morning , got caught in a riptide . We 've been here six days and I never talked to her . Never said a word to her .
kate_austen Jack , do n't .
dr_jack_shephard There were 47 of us and I never said a single word to her .
kate_austen You tried .
dr_jack_shephard No I did n't . I thought maybe I'd — I thought maybe I could bring him back and still have the time . I was there , in the water . I did n't try . I decided not to go after her .
kate_austen Jack ?
kate_austen Jack ?
kate_austen Are you okay ?
dr_jack_shephard Did you see that ?
kate_austen What ?
dr_jack_shephard Standing there , in the water , there was a man . You did n't see that ?
kate_austen Jack , when was the last time you slept ?
dr_jack_shephard I need to put this with the rest of the gear .
michael_dawson Who taught you that ?
walt_lloyd Sun , the Korean lady .
michael_dawson Do n't swallow it .
walt_lloyd Why not ?
michael_dawson Ocean water'll make you thirsty .
walt_lloyd Why ?
michael_dawson Just do n't swallow it , man . Alright ?
jinsoo_kwon 입술 좀 봐. 물을 꼭 마셔야 돼.
sunhwa_kwon 아니. 난 괜찮아요 … 고마워. 우리한테 언제 얘기해 줄까요 ? 뭘 어떻게 해야 할 지 모르겠네. 아무도 우릴 찾지 않을 것 같아요.
jinsoo_kwon 걱정하지 마. 사람이 올 거야.
sunhwa_kwon 모두 다 … 우릴 무시해요. 좀 더 적극적으로 얘기를 하려고 노력을 하면 … .
jinsoo_kwon 우리는 괜찮을 거야. 다른 사람은 필요 없어. 그냥 내가 하라는 대로 하면 돼.
shannon_rutherford Have you got it or what ?
james_ford You 're in my light , sticks .
shannon_rutherford Lightsticks ? What the hell is that supposed to ... ?
james_ford Light , comma , sticks . As in those legs of yours .
shannon_rutherford Look , while I really love my new nickname , and I think it 's really sweet ... .
james_ford Calm down . I got your damn stuff .
shannon_rutherford It 'll keep off sand fleas ?
james_ford You bet . Even has aloe .
shannon_rutherford How much ?
james_ford Your money 's no good here .
shannon_rutherford Then what the hell do you want ?
shannon_rutherford If you really think I 'm going to ... .
james_ford Five grand .
shannon_rutherford I thought you said my money was no good here .
james_ford I was negotiating . I can take an IOU . Something tells me you 're good ... for it .
claire_littleton You have n't found a hairbrush in there , have you ?
kate_austen No . Sorry .
claire_littleton I must have looked through twenty suitcases . I ca n't find one . It 's weird , right ? When you think that everyone packs a hairbrush .
kate_austen You alright ?
claire_littleton Yeah , it 's just the heat . Oh , and , and I 'm pregnant .
kate_austen Really ?
claire_littleton Thanks . What are you doing ?
kate_austen I 'm sorting the practical clothes from the impractical . Wanna help ?
claire_littleton Sure . Can I — can I ask you something ?
kate_austen Sure , shoot .
claire_littleton Are you a Gemini ?
kate_austen Yeah , I am .

claire_littleton I thought so , restless , passionate . You know , everyone thinks astrology 's just a load of crap but that 's just because they do n't get it . I can do your chart if you want to ? Or not ... . Geminis ... .
hugo_reyes Hey Jack !
hugo_reyes Whoa . You look tired , brother .
dr_jack_shephard I 'm fine . What 's up ?
hugo_reyes We got a problem .
dr_jack_shephard That 's it ?
charlie_pace That 's it .
dr_jack_shephard How many ?
charlie_pace 18 .
hugo_reyes People just kind of took what they needed because we were supposed to be rescued , but we were n't .
charlie_pace Even if we divided it up , split the bottles in half it would n't be enough for 47 people .
dr_jack_shephard 46 . There is 46 of us now .
hugo_reyes People find out this is all we have left , they 're going to freak out , man .
charlie_pace The boar 's running low until we can catch another one . What should we tell them ?
dr_jack_shephard I do n't know .
hugo_reyes Maybe we can make one of those water finding sticks .
charlie_pace What should we do with the stuff we 've got ?
dr_jack_shephard I do n't know .
charlie_pace We should put it in the tent , yeah ?
hugo_reyes Maybe the dog can find water ?
charlie_pace Probably better if no one knows how little is left .
hugo_reyes I mean , dogs can find pot and bombs , so I 'm sure they can find water .
charlie_pace Do n't tell the others we 're running low . That way you can ration it . Then you can decide what ... .
dr_jack_shephard I 'm not deciding anything !
hugo_reyes Why not ?
dr_christian_shephard SHEPHARD You wanna come in ?
dr_christian_shephard SHEPHARD So , you want to tell me what happened ?
young_jack JACK A couple guys jumped Marc Silverman .
dr_christian_shephard SHEPHARD A couple guys jumped Marc Silverman . But they did n't jump you ?
young_jack JACK No .

dr_christian_shephard SHEPHARD I had a boy on my table today . I do n't know , maybe a year younger than you . He had a bad heart . It got real hairy , real fast . And everybody 's looking at your old man to make decisions . And I was able to make those decisions because at the end of the day , after the boy died , I was able to wash my hands and come home to dinner . You know , watch a little Carol Burnett , laugh till my sides hurt . And how can I do that , hmm ? And even when I fail , how do I do that , Jack ? Because I have what it takes . Do n't choose , Jack , do n't decide . You do n't want to be a hero , you do n't try and save everyone because when you fail ... you just do n't have what it takes .
boone_carlyle Why did n't you leave me ? Hey , I 'm talking to you .
dr_jack_shephard Not now , man .
boone_carlyle I could have made it back . What ? Not going to answer me ? I told you to leave me .
dr_jack_shephard You were drowning .
boone_carlyle You should 've saved her .
dr_jack_shephard But I did n't save her . And neither did you .

boone_carlyle You think you 're all noble and heroic for coming after me ? I was fine ! You 're not the only one who knows what to do around here , you know that ? I run a business ! Who appointed you our savior , huh ? What gives you the right—. Look at me . Hey , I 'm talking to you .
boone_carlyle Look at me , Jack . Where are you going ? Hey , where are going ? Hey !
dr_jack_shephard Dad ?
margo_shephard Your father 's gone , Jack . Did you hear what I said ? He 's gone , Jack .
dr_jack_shephard He 'll be back .
margo_shephard This time it 's different . I want you to bring him back .
margo_shephard What ?
dr_jack_shephard He has n't talked to me in two months , Mom .
margo_shephard You have n't talked to him in two months .
dr_jack_shephard He does n't want me to bring him back , trust me . Let one of his friends .
margo_shephard He does n't have friends anymore . Why do you think that is ? He was right about you .
dr_jack_shephard Right about what ?
margo_shephard You do n't understand the pressure that he 's under .
dr_jack_shephard I understand pressure .
margo_shephard Jack , please you know how he gets — he doesn't — he wo n't take care of himself . You have to go after him .
dr_jack_shephard I 'm sorry . I ca n't .
"margo_shephard """ I ca n't ? """" You do n't get to say """" I ca n't . """" Not after what you did . Bring your father home , Jack .
dr_jack_shephard Where is he ?
margo_shephard Australia .
walt_lloyd Hey , hey !
kate_austen What 's the matter ?
walt_lloyd That pregnant lady fell down .
kate_austen What happened ?
charlie_pace She just dropped .
kate_austen It must be the heat . Is she breathing ?
michael_dawson Yeah , I think .
kate_austen Come on . Let 's get her inside .
charlie_pace Wake up .
kate_austen Claire ? Claire , honey , wake up . Claire ? Can you hear me , Claire . Come on . Wake up . Come on . Come on , please wake up . Come on . Claire , can you hear me ? Alright .
claire_littleton Hmm ?
kate_austen Hi . It 's me . It 's Kate .
claire_littleton What ?
kate_austen You passed out . Just take it easy , okay ? She needs water .
kate_austen Do n't move , okay ? Honey , I think you have a fever , but if you keep really still that 's okay . It 's okay , it 's okay .
charlie_pace What the ... The water 's gone . Someone stole it .
john_locke Where is the doctor ?
kate_austen I do n't know . No one can find him .
sayid_jarrah Is this the last of the camp 's water supply ?
kate_austen Yeah .
sayid_jarrah Keeping it all in one place , foolish .
kate_austen I can go into the jungle , try to find some fresh water .
sayid_jarrah You 're not going alone .

john_locke When the others find out the water 's gone it 's going to get ugly . And when they find out that someone pinched it , it 's going to get uglier . I 'll go . Camp needs you two here , especially with the doctor gone . And besides , I know where to look .
dr_jack_shephard Where are you ? Where are you ? Where are you ? !
hotel_manager MANAGER The maid says he has n't used the bed in the past three days .
dr_jack_shephard Did he rent a car from the concierge ?
hotel_manager MANAGER No , sir . Quite honestly , Mr. Shephard , I do n't think your father rented a car at all .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah , why 's that ?
hotel_manager MANAGER There was an incident a few nights ago , here at the hotel bar . I had to get security to escort your father to his room .
dr_jack_shephard What 's that have to do with renting a car ?
hotel_manager MANAGER I 'm sorry , sir , I should n't have said- .
dr_jack_shephard Come on , what 's that have to do with renting a car ?
hotel_manager MANAGER Mr. Shephard , I do n't think any rental agent in Sydney would lease your father a car in his condition .
dr_jack_shephard My father is a Chief of Surgery .
hotel_manager MANAGER Of course , sir . I apologize .
dr_jack_shephard He left his wallet . Who leaves a wallet ?
hotel_manager MANAGER Perhaps you should talk to the police , Mr. Shephard .
dr_jack_shephard Where are you ?
john_locke Take my hand . Come on .
john_locke You okay ?
charlie_pace Hey .
claire_littleton Hey . How long have I ... .
charlie_pace A couple of hours . Here . It 's not much but it 's what we have . Just relax , you have to think about the little one now , you .
claire_littleton Thanks for the water , Charlie .
charlie_pace There 'd be more if some git had n't nicked it .
claire_littleton Is Jack back yet ?
charlie_pace No . No one 's seen him . But , I would n't worry . Good old Mr. Locke 's gone into the jungle to get some water for you .
claire_littleton Great . Our only hunter 's going to get eaten just so he can get the pregnant girl some more water .

charlie_pace I would n't worry , luv . I mean , you tell me , who would you rather meet in a dark alley , whatever 's out there , or that geezer with his 400 knives ? I mean , who packs 400 knives ? Personally , I can only have space for 200 , 300 at most .
claire_littleton When are they going to rescue us ?
charlie_pace Soon .
claire_littleton Thanks , Charlie .
charlie_pace For what ?
claire_littleton People do n't seem to look me in the eye here . I think I scare them . The baby ... It 's like I 'm this time bomb of responsibility just waiting to go off .
charlie_pace You do n't scare me .
hugo_reyes Uh , the Chinese people have water .
sayid_jarrah Where did you get this ? Where did you get this ? Where ! Did ! You!- .
kate_austen She does n't understand you .
sayid_jarrah She understands me . Did you steal this water ?
sunhwa_kwon 죄송하지만 무슨 오해가 있는 것 같은데요. 그런 게 아니라 … .
jinsoo_kwon 떨어져 , 이 새끼야. 내 와이프 한 번만 더 만지면 넌 죽어.
kate_austen Just take it easy , alright . We just want to talk , alright ? This had water in it . Is it yours ? Who gave you this ?
sayid_jarrah I do n't see the water .
kate_austen And ?
sayid_jarrah You go after him now , he 'll give you nothing . But if you wait , a rat will always lead you to it 's hole .
james_ford Well , it 's about time .
kate_austen For what ?
james_ford I made this birthday wish four years ago .
kate_austen Where 's the water ?
james_ford That 's better .
kate_austen Get off of me .
sayid_jarrah Give us the water now .
james_ford Touch me again , huh .
james_ford You really think I stole your damn water ?
sayid_jarrah We know you gave two bottles to the Koreans .
james_ford I do n't give nothing to nobody .
kate_austen It 's not here .
james_ford I traded Mr. Miyagi the last of my water for a fish he caught . We worked it out caveman style .
kate_austen You gave him your last two bottles ?
james_ford Water has no value , Freckles . It 's gon na rain sooner or later . And hell , I 'm an optimist .
james_ford Hey , you forgot something . . Seeing as you 're the new sheriff in town . Might as well make it official .
dr_jack_shephard How are they , the others ?
john_locke Thirsty . Hungry . Waiting to be rescued . And they need someone to tell them what to do .
dr_jack_shephard Me ? I ca n't .
john_locke Why ca n't you ?
dr_jack_shephard Because I 'm not a leader .
john_locke And yet they all treat you like one .
dr_jack_shephard I do n't know how to help them . I 'll fail . I do n't have what it takes .
john_locke Why are you out here , Jack ?
dr_jack_shephard I think I 'm going crazy .
john_locke No . You 're not going crazy .
dr_jack_shephard No ?
john_locke No , crazy people do n't know they 're going crazy . They think they 're getting sane . So , why are you out here ?
dr_jack_shephard I 'm chasing something — someone .
john_locke Ah . The white rabbit . Alice in Wonderland .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah , wonderland , because who I 'm chasing — he 's not there .
john_locke But you see him ?
dr_jack_shephard Yes . But he 's not there .
john_locke And if I came to you and said the same thing , then what would your explanation be , as a doctor .
dr_jack_shephard I 'd call it a hallucination . A result of dehydration , post traumatic stress , not getting more than two hours of sleep a night for the past week . All of the above .
john_locke All right , then . You 're hallucinating . But what if you 're not ?
dr_jack_shephard Then we 're all in a lot of trouble .

john_locke I 'm an ordinary man , Jack , meat and potatoes , I live in the real world . I 'm not a big believer in magic . But this place is different . It 's special . The others do n't want to talk about it because it scares them . But we all know it . We all feel it . Is your white rabbit a hallucination ? Probably . But what if everything that happened here , happened for a reason ? What if this person that you 're chasing is really here ?
dr_jack_shephard That 's impossible .
john_locke Even if it is , let 's say it 's not .
dr_jack_shephard Then what happens when I catch him ?
john_locke I do n't know . But I 've looked into the eye of this Island . And what I saw was beautiful .
dr_jack_shephard Wait , wait , wait , where are you going ?
john_locke To find some more water .
dr_jack_shephard I 'll come with you .
john_locke No . You need to finish what you started .
dr_jack_shephard Why ?
john_locke Because a leader ca n't lead until he knows where he 's going .

MEDICAL EXAMINER The police found him in an alley in Queens Cross . Now , a tox screen showed a blood alcohol content , which for a man of his size , probably brought on myocardial infarction - a sizable , and fatal heart - attack .
dr_jack_shephard That 's him .
dr_jack_shephard What do you mean you wo n't put it on the plane ?
ticket_agent I 'm sorry Mr. Shephard , but our policy is that the body must have the proper documentation . There 's just no latitude .
dr_jack_shephard No latitude ? No latitude ?
ticket_agent Without the proper documents- .
dr_jack_shephard Look , you ca n't do this to me . I 'm ready to go now .
ticket_agent Perhaps another carrier ?
dr_jack_shephard No !

dr_jack_shephard I want you to listen to me , okay . Because I 'm asking you a favor , Chrissy . I 'm standing in front of you in the same suit that I 'm wearing to my father 's funeral and I 'm asking you a favor . In 16 hours I need to land at LAX , and I need that coffin to clear customs because there 's going to be a hearse waiting there . And I need that hearse to take me and that coffin to a cemetery . Why ? Chrissy , why ca n't I just bring him to a funeral home and make all the arrangements ? Why ca n't I really take my time with it ? Because ... because I need it to be done . I need it to be over . I just — I need to bury my father .
boone_carlyle Hey , hey , Claire .
claire_littleton How did you get that ?
boone_carlyle Shhh .
charlie_pace Where 'd you get that ?
charlie_pace Here 's your thief .
michael_dawson Where 'd he hide it ?
charlie_pace I do n't know . This wanker had three bottles on him . Why 'd you do it , pretty boy , eh ?
boone_carlyle It was just sitting in — it was just sitting in the tent , and Jack just took off .
charlie_pace Claire could 've died !
boone_carlyle I tried to give her some sooner , but it just got out of hand . No one would have understood .
kate_austen What is going on ?
boone_carlyle Someone had to take responsibility for it . It would have never lasted !
charlie_pace Oh shut up !

dr_jack_shephard Leave him alone ! It 's been six days and we 're all still waiting . Waiting for someone to come . But what if they do n't ? We have to stop waiting . We need to start figuring things out . A woman died this morning just going for a swim and he tried to save her , and now you 're about to crucify him ? We ca n't do this . Every man for himself is not going to work . It 's time to start organizing . We need to figure out how we 're going to survive here . Now , I found water . Fresh water , up in the valley . I 'll take a group in at first light . If you do n't wanna come then find another way to contribute . Last week most of us were strangers , but we 're all here now . And god knows how long we 're going to be here . But if we ca n't live together , we 're going to die alone .
sunhwa_kwon 고마워요-- 아까 물 갖다 줘서.
jinsoo_kwon 남편이니까 그렇게 해야지.
james_ford So , how does it feel ?
boone_carlyle How does what feel ?
james_ford Taking my place at the top of everyone 's most hated list . Sucks , do n't it ?
dr_jack_shephard Thanks .
kate_austen So where were you today Jack ?
dr_jack_shephard Just had to take care of a few things .
kate_austen That 's all I 'm gon na get , huh ?
dr_jack_shephard My father died . In Sydney .
kate_austen I 'm sorry .
dr_jack_shephard Yeah . I 'm sorry , too .
